name: Saint Luis Rey (Non Cuban) - Gen2 - Robusto
additionalNotes:
First produced in Cuba, Saint Luis Rey cigars are now meticulously handcrafted in Honduras using nothing but the finest premium tobacco. These flavorful cigars are one of the most highly acclaimed premium cigar brands in the star-studded Altadis U.S.A. brand portfolio. Handmade in Honduras, these exquisite 
The origins of this cigar's name are cloaked in mystery. One theory is that a Thornton Wilder novel, "The Bridge of San Luis Rey," was the inspiration behind this smoke's moniker. Another is that it was named after the town of San Luis in the Vuelta Abajo tobacco region in Cuba, where these cigars were originally rolled.Â
